item.title: The number of 401(k) millionaires just hit a record high: ‘People are staying the course.’

item.title: America’s ‘sugar daddy’ just went broke — and you’re stuck with the bill
item.description: Japan can’t — and won’t — finance the U.S. anymore. Here’s why that matters for your money, your mortgage and basic portfolio moves.

item.title: From price cuts to bidding wars, America’s home buyers are in two wildly different worlds
item.description: As home sales slowly recover, the Northeast and Midwest are seeing a bigger rebound than the South and the West, according to new data.
